publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4579 Tricia Marwick: 40th Anniversary of Tanshall Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates Tanshall Primary School in Glenrothes on its 40th anniversary; notes that since 1969 the school has been at the centre of the west of Glenrothes community and has provided a fantastic primary education for a countless number of local children; commends head teacher Elaine Davidson and her staff for their excellent recent HM Inspectorate of Education report, and believes this is the ideal present for the school’s 40th anniversary. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, John Park*, Sandra White*
S3M-4579 40th Anniversary of Tanshall Primary School (lodged on 8 July 2009) Angela Constance*
